title: Sold: T206 Walter Johnson Portrait, SGC 2.5
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: Sold: T206 Walter Johnson Portrait, SGC 2.5
posts.post_content:
Nice looking and well centered Walter Johnson portrait.  2.5 grade is the result of corner rounding/wear and a faint crease/wrinkle in the upper right corner.  My scanner does not handle slabbed cards very well (the large image below), but I am happy to email larger iPhone photos if you would like to have a closer look.

SOLD total, net to me (no taxes and I pay for shipping).  PayPal (Friend) preferred.

Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with questions.

Thanks!
